title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc. The obfuscated classes are currently displayed prominently in the dialog.
OB: Currently, the obfuscated classes are displayed prominently in the all types dialog.
EB: They should be less prominent in the all types dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the all types dialog in JDK 1.4.
2. Observe the obfuscated classes being displayed prominently.
